Question
========

In a *random sample* of 60 Rotterdammers, one finds 24 foreigners foreigners. The 95% *confidence interval* for the proportion of foreigners in the population then has a *margin of error* equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.004
* 0.063
* 0.124

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.004: Incorrect
* 0.063: Incorrect
* 0.124: Correct
